info.name: Dark and Clean 8ch
info.description: Do I really need to describe this to you? If you want me to, I will... Are you sure you want that? When asked to list your aspirations in life, do you typically respond with "Pestered some guy named after a dirty Chinese steel to describe a blatantly obvious stylistic overhaul."? If so, you should consider enlisting the help of a psychologist to potentially cure you of your evident ailment.
